      • crackEnigma

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> crackEnigma​(BombeSettings setting,
                                                         java.lang.String message,
                                                         java.lang.String word)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Uses 3 different settings to crack a enigmaMachine given a known word.
        Parameters:
        setting - what bombe settings should be used
        message - the string to decrypt
        word - the known word in the decrypted String
        Returns:
        an arrayList with all the possible decrypted Strings
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if settings is null or something is wrong with the enigma machine
